main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over southern Japan on December 9, 1952, at an altitude of 3,500 feet, with a yellow intermittently blinking color.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object was described as erratic in course and moving at an estimated speed of 600 mph,Initial observations noted the object changing colors from yellow to green and finally to red,Weather conditions were overcast, which may have affected visibility,No radar contact was made during the observation.
